name: Kvistkampen
description:
How to play: (Landscape mode if you play on your phone!!)

Answer questions given to you and if you answer correctly you will attack your opponent in the arena. If no one gets defeated you go over to the next round of questions. This loops until someone wins!

My game vision:

A mobile game with questions suited for teenagers but hopefully known by adults to make them feel good about themselves when they defeat their enemy with questions about the alphabet, countries, flags, continents, numbers and simple math! 

(I will add famous buildings, animals, fruit, tools?, famous people, instruments and other subjects in the future) 

Challenge the world and climb the global ladders or fight to be the best in your country or do a more friendly game and challenge your friends .. to the death!

Choose your avatar and change its colors to what ever suits you, loot items to make your avatar look better and more scary than your opponents! (with no effect on gameplay)

Non of the graphics are made by me and will be replaced in the future.

(If you played even for 30 seconds or If you have suggestions on what type of questions I could add or critique, please do so in the comments and let me know! Thanks)
